title: CANT DOWNLOAD LEAGUE OF LEGENDS
body: guys please help when try to download league i start downloading and then it either gives me the error at 99 percent when i let it over thr night or it gives me the errror randomly at any point and i had this problem for 2 weeks and i cant play league anymore help please!! i am a Nasus main so please help

replies.body: Having an error at that phase of the patcher suggests a connection problem to the patching servers, so it's backtracking to grab missed data or failing entirely.  You should run through every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune it up.  I hope that helps!
